phrases: It was not a height that we could jump from.
and the demons did not underestimate us.
With that cliff, security would not be necessary.
So that means we cannot escape from the wall?
So I tried going to the edge of the wall.
It split into two more walls.
One side continued along the cliff.
The other wall was the side of our House.
The angles were about 60 degrees each.
The inside of the two walls, where it splits, were nearly symmetrical.
I saw the same scenery in front of me.
It means this Grace Field House is on a hexagonal property surrounded by a cliff.
And the lot west from our Plant Three is probably the headquarters.
That lot was the only one with a bridge.
If we are surrounded by cliffs, then crossing the bridge will be the only way to escape.
- Tell her that I will be right there.
So you were planning to return from the start, huh?
That we will stay alive together!
But you were already planning to...
I cannot afford to make a mistake.
Because I cannot let anyone die.
If I run away, the plan will deviate.
If it deviates even a little, it will be problematic.
I do not even want a chance of losing.
I will not change my mind.
I did what I can today.
I am leaving the rest to you.
Because of you two, I had a good life.
It is still not too late to run away.
Run and hide in the forest.
Like I just said, I am not going to change my mind.
You have caught a cold again.
So listen everyone, do not enter the infirmary for a while, all right?
But Norman, you always feel lonely every time you get sick.
I did not want you to feel sad.
I will talk so you do not have to, so let us hang out!
I was told that I do not get sick.
What would you do if you got sick, too.
But Ray said I will be fine.
This book said idiots do not get sick.
Do not go near the infirmary anymore.
Ray taught me how to make it.
Geez, you really do not give up, do you?
He said we can talk by using these!
Now we can talk even though I am out here!
If you yell like that, you do not even need the string phone.
Instead of a crying face, send me off with a smile, okay?
Can I count on you to help Emma in my place?
He said he did not want to see Norman off.
Take care of Emma and Ray, okay?
I know you are reckless, but this is too far, Emma!
This is not what you should be doing right now!
I will not let you go!
I am not wishing for any of that.
I just want you to send me off with a smile.
I just cannot respect those feelings!
Especially if you do not even want to go!
I understand that you are sad, but you are getting too hotheaded.
If you because another commotion, I will kill you.
if I say my last goodbye to Emma?
I am sorry for tricking you.
Do not get anymore injuries, okay?
I am leaving the rest to you.
Because no matter what I put in, I cannot take it with me.
You would not have ever ran away.
I knew it from the beginning.
You are doing the right thing.
Now I can ship out Ray and Emma when they are mature.
Until the end of the time that was decided, happily inside home, right?
Because I was able to meet someone like you.
Can you wait in this room for a little bit?
Remembering to appreciate that all 37 of you are able to live here happily...
I have never seen her look like that before.
Well, the three of them were good friends.
So, what did you want to talk to me about?
We have to decide what to do, right?
We are surrounded by a cliff.
And the only bridge going out is in the headquarters.
If you want to run away, then run.
Norman is dead, and Ray's a mess.
You cannot do anything on your own.
Now, you will never be able to escape.
The best way to not suffer from despair is to give up.
If you desire it, I would like to recommend you as the candidate to be Mom of this farm.
A candidate to be a Mom?
Become an adult, have a child, and if they approve your abilities,
you can come back to this House as a Mom or Sister.
You have the qualifications for it.
If you desire it, I would be happy to recommend you.
Who would become such a thing?
But then, what can you do?
Live and strive to become a Mom.
Accept the despair and free yourself from the pain.
I cannot do that, no matter what.
Then you can writhe in agony as you await your death.
Think about that as much as you want.
What are you doing at this hour?
It is my last night, so I am saying goodbye to the House.
Ray, it is your birthday tomorrow, right?
You have not actually given up, have you?
